about.text1: Hi!üöÄ I'm here to come up with and execute innovative solutions for you in the digital world.
about.text2: I specialize in .NET and React technologies, constantly pushing the boundaries to make our projects even better.

studio.title: Women's Studio W≈Çoc≈Çawek
studio.description: A business card website combined with an offer presentation section made for a women's studio in W≈Çoc≈Çawek.

bank.title: Bank Simulator
bank.description: Online banking simulator. The application was written using React + Vite + .Net, offering functionalities such as: Admin panel, transfers between accounts, currency conversions, account creation, currency accounts, joint accounts, application approvals and messaging.

fizjo.title: PhysioPanel
fizjo.description: An application facilitating the work of physiotherapists - appointment planner, treatment history management, pain visualization and the ability to run a blog. Created using React + Next.js + .Net.

cv.title: CV Website
cv.description: Application created in Next.js. A website serving as an online CV.

collaboration.title: Our Collaboration Process
collaboration.subtitle: A clear and transparent journey from idea to implementation

consultation.title: Initial Consultation
consultation.description: We start with a detailed discussion about your needs, goals, and vision. This helps us understand your requirements and create a tailored solution.

planning.title: Project Planning
planning.description: We create a detailed project roadmap, define milestones, and establish clear communication channels to ensure smooth collaboration.

development.title: Development Phase
development.description: Our team works on implementing your solution, keeping you updated with regular progress reports and demos.

review.title: Review & Feedback
review.description: We present the work-in-progress for your review, gather feedback, and make necessary adjustments to meet your expectations.

launch.title: Launch & Support
launch.description: After thorough testing, we deploy your solution and provide ongoing support to ensure everything runs smoothly.

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Settings
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking 'Accept All', you consent to our use of cookies.
cookieConsent.modalDescription: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking 'Accept All', you consent to our use of cookies.
cookieConsent.analyticsDescription: Analytical cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
cookieConsent.necessaryDescription: Necessary cookies are required for the website to function properly.
cookieConsent.preferencesDescription: Preference cookies enable the website to remember information that changes the way the site behaves or looks.
cookieConsent.marketingDescription: Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites and display relevant ads.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

dataCollection.title: What data do we collect?
dataCollection.description: We may collect the following data:
dataCollection.personalInfo: Personal information such as name and email address
dataCollection.usageData: Usage data including IP address and browsing behavior

dataUsage.title: How we use your data
dataUsage.communicate: Communicate with you about our services

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.objection: Object to processing of your data

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

termsOfService.introduction: By using this website, you agree to the following terms. If you do not agree with any of them, please do not use the service.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of terms
acceptance.description: Using the website means you accept these terms.

services.title: Scope of services
services.description: We offer services in web development, web applications, UI/UX design, and graphic design.

obligations.title: User obligations
obligations.description: The user agrees to use the website in accordance with the law and good practices.

intellectualProperty.description: All content on the website is protected by copyright and may not be copied without permission.

liability.title: Liability
liability.description: We are not liable for damages resulting from the use of the website.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: We may block access to the website in case of violation of the terms.

changes.title: Changes to terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to change the terms at any time.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.introduction: This policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and how you can manage them.
